content: this crochet throw blanket is made from the softest velvet yarn and adds understated luxury to your living space this pattern is incredibly beginner friendly and can be easily adapted to any size you want the pattern includes stitch counts for throw lapghan/crib and stroller blanket sizes the pattern also includes a photo tutorial for making tassels dimensions 50 x 60 skill level - beginner yarn used - lion brand vel-luxe the sample uses marigold this pattern uses american units and crochet stitch abbreviations this item is a digital download pdf as such there are no refunds for this pattern however if you have a question or issue with it please feel free to contact me this pattern is copyrighted please do not share this document or reproduce it in any way feel free to sell any items made from my patterns i just ask that you give credit
